item.title: Lumion : Landscape Design & Photorealistic Rendering

Landscape architecture is about creating great cities, streets, parks and public spaces – ones that inspire healthy living and wellbeing while protecting natural environments and people.

item.description: Bu eğitimde Catia V5 programının montaj modülüne yani Assembly Design modülüne değiniyor olacağız. Ayrıca Catia V5 programı içerisinde bulunan, kinematik olarak simülasyonlar yapmamıza imkan tanıyan ve kinematik montaj olarak da bilinen DMU Kinematics modülüne de temel olarak değiniyor olacağız. Eğitim içerisinde montaj komutlarını ileri seviye örnekler üzerinden sizlere anlatmaya çalıştık. Eğitimin asıl konusunu V6 motor montajı kısmı oluşturmaktadır. Bir V6 otomobil motorunu hem Catia V5 programında hem de NX programında tüm montaj komutlarını görerek, öğrenerek ve anlayarak birlikte montajlıyacağız.

Motion Graphics and Visual Effects are becoming increasingly valuable and important in any video created. Learning how to create these animations using Adobe After Effects has become essential.

item.title: SketchUp Architectural Design Essentials Kit
item.description: Learn Architectural Design In SketchUp with the SketchUp Architectural Design Essentials Kit Course. In this course, we will develop an existing building model into an Architecturally detailed one. We will walk through what is needed in the site, in the windows, doors, facades, roof and other elements so that the model will read as Architecture.

item.title: Easy Patternmaking Kit: Learn How To Draft Trousers
item.description: The Easy Patternmaking Kit - Trouser Drafting Course teaches you how to construct a beautiful pair of trousers. In this course, you learn to draft a pattern for a pair of trousers along wit belt and zipper attachments, using fitting measurements, and quality techniques. We begin with organizing your pattern paper with accurate measurements laid out properly. You will then learn to calculate the circumference measurements, the darts, and allowances for a quality fit.

item.title: Patternmaking For Beginners: Draft An Offshoulder Dress

We begin with organizing your pattern paper with accurate measurements laid out properly. You will then learn to calculate the armhole, the waist darts, and allowances.

item.title: Adobe InDesign. Aprende a maquetar de manera profesional

Es un programa fácil de comprender y dinámico. Nos permite diseñar y maquetar de una manera ágil y creativa incluyendo elementos como títulos, textos, imágenes e incluso enlaces para su visualización posterior en páginas web. También nos permite configurar nuestras propias plantillas, crear hojas de estilo para automatizar parámetros como la fuente, el tamaño, el color, etc… y otros muchos accesos directos para acelerar el proceso de diseño y hacer la vida del maquetador un poco más sencilla.

Únete a nuestro curso completo para mostrarte cómo crear una tienda online profesional y totalmente personalizada en WordPress. Independientemente del propósito de tu tienda online, este curso te mostrará todo lo que necesita saber para crear una tienda online impresionante. He estado creando y usando tiendas virtuales durante más de 5 años para mis negocios en línea, lo que me convierte en el más calificado para enseñarte sobre cómo crear una tienda online con WordPress desde cero.

item.title: 8 Proven Steps to Make a Silver Ring
item.description: Are you curious about silver jewellery making but don't know where to start, unsure what tools you need or whether you'll enjoy jewellery making? Would you love to learn jewellery making but don't want a big expense and commitment? Are the courses you've researched too long, unavailable right now, not near you, at inconvenient times or fully booked? On this course you will :- Learn how to set up your workspace at home with 5 short easy to follow videos.

item.title: Diseño de Cabañas
item.description: Diseño de Cabañas Aprende de forma integral el proceso de diseño y ejecución de cabañas. Instructores: Arquitecto Álvaro García y Arquitecta Lucía Fernández Actualizado: Mayo de 2022 Estudiantes: +3.000 Descripción del Curso: La formación te permitirá convertirte en un experto en la materia, y todo ello desde una formación principalmente práctica. A través de variadas actividades y proyectos completos podrás adquirir los conocimientos suficientes para ejercer profesionalmente de forma solvente. Además conocerás en detalle mi flujo de trabajo a la hora de afrontar un proyecto profesional.

item.title: New illustration Painting - Digital Photoshop Drawing Course
item.description: In 2021, about 40,000 students have learned this 'Guochao' illustration course in China. Just come and join them to see what you can create. What is 'Guochao' illustration style? There are many kinds of Chinese style illustration, 'Guochao' is one of them. 'Guochao' means based on the Chinese traditional culture background, adding some modern fashion elements. It is also the illustration style mainly introduced in this course. This course has 4 parts (total 11 lessons) with downloadable resources.

item.title: Architectural Shop Drawing Plans in AutoCAD 2020
item.description: Part 1: Learn the basics commands in AutoCAD to be ready to the shop drawing practice ( How to draw lines, How to draw polyline, Copy, Move, Mirror, Offset, Fillet, Trim, Rotate, How to draw X-line, How to draw circle, How to draw Hatch in AutoCAD, How to do match properties in AutoCAD, How to print a sheet in AutoCAD. Part 2: Architectural Shop Drawing in AutoCAD 2020 Do you need more practice with AutoCAD?

item.title: Adobe Photoshop CC- Basic Photoshop training
item.description: Learning the basics of Adobe Photoshop is definitely not easy, especially if you have no prior knowledge in this field. But, this course can teach you everything you need to know to start using photoshop and making your own projects with pictures that you take yourself or pictures that you have simply found on the internet. If you: - Are a student and need to learn how to properly use Photoshop

item.description: A professional photoshop course with advance photoshop training where a student will learn about selection and masking, how to design logo, t-shirt, business card, resume, mug, bottle, calendar, cover, gif, along with that student will learn how to earn money by graphics designing work, retouching, advance use of photoshop tools etc. It’s a professional photoshop course specially for graphics designers and before enrol this course you must have knowledge about basic photoshop.

item.description: Hi There, I am Stephen Koel Soren and I am a Graphics and Web Expert. If you are a beginner and looking to learn photoshop from scratch then this course will help you to learn Adobe Photoshop Professionally. For learning graphics design and photoshop retouching from beginner to advanced this course can be a lighthouse for you. You can learn from this course about Photoshop Layer, Color and Adjustment, Photoshop Color Correction, Shape and Symbol, Content-Aware & Cropping, Photoshop Text Style, Gradient Stroke & Bevel, Shadow, Blending, Selection, Photoshop Masking, Blur & Filters, Transform, Warp & Distort, Clipping Mask, Retouch, Photoshop Retouching, Effect Of Visual Style, Brush, Export, Earning Money With Graphics Design Work, Advance Tool and many more.

item.title: Introducción al diseño web: HTML y CSS
item.description: El lenguaje de marcado de hipertexto (HTML) es el lenguaje de marcado estándar para los documentos diseñados para ser vistos en un navegador web. Puede ayudarse de tecnologías como las hojas de estilo en cascada (CSS). CSS describe cómo deben mostrarse los elementos HTML en la pantalla, en el papel o en otros medios. Juntos entenderemos cómo crear una página web utilizando HTML y CSS HTML5, CSS3, Head, Body, Semantic Tags.

item.title: Curso de HostGator 2022: El Hosting Ideal Para WordPress
item.description: HOSTGATOR es un servicio de alojamiento web que proporciona alojamiento compartido, alojamiento en la nube, soluciones empresariales, alojamiento de correo electrónico y registro de dominio. Es uno de los proveedores de hosting (alojamiento web) más populares y con más demanda del internet. item.title: الاظهار المعماري للمسقط الافقي بالخامات المختلفة للمبتدئين
item.description: أهلا بكم في الكورس التعليمي "الاظهار المعماري للمسقط الافقي بالخامات المختلفة للمبتدئين". كان هدفي بهذا الكورس الاحساس بالمتعة من خلال التعامل مع الاظهار لمجموعة من المساقط الافقية الصغيرة المساحة لكي تكون مناسبة للمبتدئين لتعلم اساسيات ومبادئ الاظهار المعماري اليدوي بالخامات المختلفة مثل أقلام الرصاص / الالوان الخشب / الوان الماركر من المستوي صفر لاظهار امكانيات كل خامة من الالوان وقدرتها على التعبير بجرأة في الاظهار المعماري, وذلك بناء علي تكنيك مبسط وسهل في استعمال كل خخامة الاقلام الرصاص بمختلف درجاتها.

You will learn how to design a fire fighter tshirt, how to design hero soldier or I’d rather die like a man than live like a coward tagline design, how to design a wanted black and white tshirt, how design a lumberjack tshirt using only with elements.

item.title: Simple Cartoon Drawing Course : a Kid driving a Car
item.description: Drawing a Car can be very complicated when editing the transparent windShield; in this masterclass, i will teach you a simple technique to achieve Transparent Glasses using aKid in His Toy Car. This is a Real Time Step-By Step Process of the entire Drawing and Editing using Photoshop. Hello I'm T.S Amachree, I have been a Cartoonist for more than 13 years and I have upgraded my techniques over the years; I love deeply sharing my Knoweldge and Experience with you, How I Draw and Color My Cartoon Characters.

item.title: Catia V5 Composites Design Eğitimi! | Kompozit Tasarımı!
item.description: CATIA, bir Fransız Havacılık Şirketi tarafından tasarlanan ileri seviye bir CAD (Computer Aided Design), yani Bilgisayar Destekli Tasarım Programıdır. İçerisinde bir çok sektöre hitap eden modüllerin bulunması, CATIA programının birinci tercih edilme sebebidir. Programın bu kadar çok modüle sahip olmasından da en çok ülkemizde Otomotiv, Havacılık ve Savunma Sanayi gibi sektörlerde kullanılmaktadır. Aynı zamanda da ülkemizde CATIA programının en çok kullanılan versiyonu da CATIA V5 versiyonudur. Bu eğitim de CATIA V5 R21 sürümü ile hazırlanmıştır.

item.title: Kalıp Tasarım Mühendislerinden Solidworks Eğitimi!
item.description: Solidworks eğitimini Kalıp Tasarım Mühendislerinden öğrenmeye hazır mısınız? Tüm tasarım ve imalat tecrübelerimizi sizinle paylaşacağımız Solidworks eğitiminde göreceğiniz ileri seviye 3D modelleme teknikleri ile piyasada rahatlıkla fark yaratabileceksiniz! Eğitmenler olarak uzun yıllar çalıştığımız plastik enjeksiyon ve sac metal kalıp tasarımlarında edindiğimiz bilgi birikimlerimizi şimdi sizinle paylaşmaya hazırız! Bu eğitimimizde Solidworks programının önemli olan tüm modüllerine sıfırdan başlayarak, ileri seviyeye kadar değineceğiz. Eğitimimiz gelen istekler doğrultusunda her zaman güncel tutulmaya da çalışılacaktır.

item.title: NX ile EDM Tezgahları için Bakır Elektrot Tasarımı Eğitimi!
item.description: Elektroerozyon (EDM), iş parçasına istenilen şekli vermek için elektrik boşalmasından faydalanılan üretim yöntemidir. Elektrik iletkeni malzemelere uygulananır. Metal aşındırma işlemi takım görevini yapan bir elektrot ile iş parçası arasında meydana gelen kıvılcımların yardımıyla gerçekleştirilir. Kıvılcımlar, ergime ve buharlaşma yoluyla çok küçük malzeme parçacıkları kaldırarak parça yüzeyini erozyona tabi tutar ve parça üzerinde ufak çukurlar oluşturur. EDM sırasında elektrot ile iş parçası arasındaki mesafe 0,0125 mm ile 0,05 mm arasındadır. Bu mesafe takım ve iş parçası arasında elektrik arkı oluşması için yeterlidir.

item.title: NX ile Maçalar için Hidrolik Piston Tasarımı Eğitimi!
item.description: Hidrolik pistonlar, üzerindeki sıvı basıncını, silindir şeklindeki piston mekanizması sayesinde hareket enerjisine dönüştürebilen, yani uygulanan basınçla mekanik enerji üretebilen sistemlerdir. Hidrolik pompalar tarafından üretilen enerji çeşitli silindirler yardımıyla doğrusal veya açısal harekete dönüşmektedir. Buradaki açığa çıkan kuvvetin büyüklüğünü belirleyen en önemli faktörler, silindirin çapı ve çeşididir. Hidrolik silindir gövde ve piston olarak iki ana parçadan meydana gelir. Bunların yanında sızdırmazlık elemanları ve bağlantı elemanları silindir üzerinde bulunmaktadır. Çok yüksek basınçlarda kullanıldığı için gömlek et kalınlığı kaldırabileceği basınca göre hesaplanır.

item.title: Becoming A UX Writer
item.description: UX writing is the verbal user communication within digital interfaces. It appears in apps, websites, and all other kinds of digital products that users interact with – and, as such, it is an integral part of the user experience. For writers and designers, however, UX writing is much more than that: Since big tech companies have become increasingly aware of the importance of UX writing, the young discipline offers promising job opportunities, exciting tasks, and a great career outlook.

item.title: Canva: Certificação Designer Gráfico Profissional | 2022 |
item.description: Olá! Seja bem vind@ ao curso mais completo de Canva 2022 aqui da plataforma! Muito prazer, eu sou o professor Rafael Galvão, sou designer gráfico a mais de 3 anos e tenho mais de 8 milhões de visualizações em todos os meus projetos! Já desenvolvi trabalhos para pequenas, médias e grandes empresas e Universidades no Brasil e no exterior! Vou compartilhar contigo no curso por meio de uma metodologia de fácil compreensão várias dicas estratégicas para o desenvolvimento dos seus projetos do absoluto zero até o mercado!

item.title: Rigging a Character with Duik Bassel in After Effects
item.description: You may have the same question that Is it possible to rig a character and then create a walk cycle for it, in the shortest time and easiest way? To answer this question I have to say: Yes, The Duik Basel script has provided this. With this script you can easily rig your character, just by one click and also you can create walk cycle animation for your character, just by one click.

item.title: Der ultimative Adobe Photoshop CC Wekzeuge Kurs [2021]
item.description: Info zu dem Kurs In diesem ultimativen Adobe Photoshop CC Werkzeuge Kurs auf deutsch lernst Du nicht nur die Einstellungen aller Werkzeuge kennen, sondern ich werde Dir auch noch ein paar Anwendungsbeispiele zeigen, die man als Designer oder Fotograf für Grafiken und Fotobearbeitung ganz gut gebrauchen kann. Ganz egal ob Webdesigner, Mediendesigner, Logodesigner, Grafikdesigner, Künstler, Fotograf, Freelancer oder einfacher Hobby Photoshopper in diesem Kurs ist für jeden etwas dabei! Zusätzlich werde ich Dir neben den Werkzeugen auch noch zeigen wo Du kostenlose Pinsel und Schriftarten herunterladen kannst und ich werde Dir auch die Mischmodis, Pinseleinstellungen, den Farbwähler, auswählen + maskieren und die Kopierquellen beibringen, daher diese Punkte auch alle mit den Photoshop Werkzeugen zusammenhängen.

item.title: Создание бизнес презентации в PowerPoint с нуля
item.description: Курс "Создание бизнес презентации в PowerPoint с нуля" состоит из 10 основных лекций, каждая из которых посвящена созданию 1 из 10 слайдов. Опыт показывает, что 10-12 слайдов – это оптимальный размер бизнес-презентации. Помимо лекций, к курсу прилагается папка с исходными файлами, чтобы облегчить Вам поиск необходимых для дизайна иконок и фото. Также к курсу прилагаются 7 бонусных видео и домашние задания, разработанные к каждой теме. В них я делюсь секретами профессионального дизайнера, даю советы и вдохновляю Вас на лучшие результаты.

item.title: Realistic Interior creation/render with blender from scratch
item.description: The course has been created using a free software blender 2.83 software, Students can make use of either blender 2.8 or any later version(2.81, 2.82, 2.83.....)This course has been developed to meet the need of anyone who wants to learn to use the blender software to create stunning interior images. It has been designed to meet the needs of those who either haven't used Blender software at all, have an understanding of the software interface, or perhaps make use of other software programs and want to learn to use blender.

item.title: Adobe Photoshop Quick Start for Absolute Beginners
item.description: If you want to learn the basics of photoshop but do not have a great deal of time, this course is for you! Adobe Photoshop used to be this really complex and even cryptic piece of software that only a few people knew how to really get in there and work. I have been using Photoshop off and on for about 20 years and not just for digital art. My name is rich Grayson.

item.title: Passive Income: Beginners Design & Print on demand
item.description: This is an awesome Photoshop course that teaches you how to use this program from a complete beginner to create a design and selling option for it. Even if you've never touched Photoshop in your life. I can teach you how to design like a pro. I have also added a few tips & tricks that I learned over the years. This course is like no other course on the internet.

item.title: Las Patologías en Edificios y Construcción Arquitectónica
item.description: Las Patologías en los Edificios Introducción a la interpretación de las posibles causas de patologías en edificación. Instructores: Arquitecto Álvaro García y Arquitecto Técnico Jaime López. Contenido Actualizado: Octubre 2021 Calificación: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ Descripción del Curso: Los edificios tienen una vulnerabilidad propia que resulta más o menos importante, pero inevitable. Las deficiencias inherentes a las técnicas y los materiales utilizados en su ejecución, por un lado, y el uso funcional de los mismos a lo largo de su vida útil, por otro, hace que vayan sufriendo un implacable deterioro que obliga a alguna intervención en un momento determinado de su vida, a pesar, incluso, de un adecuado mantenimiento.

item.title: VRay SketchUp. De Básico a Profesional Experto (ChaosGroup)
item.description: VRay 2.0 para SketchUp. De Básico a Profesional Experto Renderiza tus modelos de SketchUp y consigue imágenes hiperrealistas que muestren tus proyectos de forma más atractiva. Instructor: Arquitecto Álvaro García. Contenido Actualizado: Octubre 2021 Calificación: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ ··························································································································································· Nota: Si tienes una versión de VRay superior o igual a la 3.4 accede a mi curso "SketchUp 2020 + VRay Next. Aprende con Proyectos 3D Reales" ··························································································································································· Descripción del Curso: En este curso te enseño a dominar V-Ray para SketchUp, una de las herramientas líderes en el renderizado por su rapidez y realismo, con un rico y completo set de funciones y características.

item.title: Become Professional Social Media Visual Designer | Canva
item.description: Canva helps you to professionally prepare many images such as social media posts, logos, posters, presentations, invitations, cards, advertisements from your phone, tablet or computer. Every design has some rules, of course, but it depends on the imagination on the basis of design ability. Canva gives you exactly this support. You don't need to have miracle design knowledge to use Canva. All you have to do is use your imagination and with the support of us, effortlessly pour all this into the design.

item.title: Graphic Design: Side Hustle to Self-Employed
item.description: Are you thinking about going full-time as a freelancer in graphic design? Even if you are just ramping up your freelance life after hours, this class will give you a bunch of tools and tips that will set you up for success! It's a huge endeavor to get a business off the ground - especially if the business is in creative production ( like graphic design, 3D modeling, illustration, etc). Not only are you responsible for your day-to-day deliverables, but you also have to market yourself, bill clients, network, and so much more!

item.title: »PHOTOSHOP | realiza 100 DISEÑOS en un minuto «
item.description: Desde hace tiempo estas usando Photoshop ya sea como fotógrafo, diseñador o community manager, sin embargo, a pesar de que manejas muy bien el programa en tu área de interés, tu flujo de trabajo es sumamente lento, durando horas en procesos que te consumen todo el tiempo. En este curso avanzado de Photoshop te desvelo todos mis secretos para que al igual que yo puedas tener un flujo de trabajo acelerado, gracias a los procesos automatizados de Photoshop.

item.title: Graphic Design - Biding For Online Work 101
item.description: eBook Included in Class! There are lots of ways to build your portfolio, meet new clients and make money with graphic design. One of those avenues is online bid-for-work websites like Upwork. These sites let you upload your portfolio, check out job listings, and offer a bid to do the work based on the client's description of the job they need to be done. Seems easy enough? Not always! If you are.

item.title: A complete Website Development tool without Programming
item.description: Free Website Designing without Programming Language : Once you pay for your web design, you are the owner of your website. We don’t use any proprietary software to keep you locked down. You’re free to take your website with you and make any changes. Dynamic CMS Get a site with all dynamic options of CMS. Site will be mobile ready and fit itself into any browser. Features We give you Blog, Photo / Video Gallery, News, Testimonial, Contact Form with Map with easy frontend editing option.

item.title: Photoshop Challenge
item.description: Adobe Photoshop es el programa más potente del mercado para la transformación, retoque y reparación de imágenes digitales, así como para la elaboración de todo tipo de creatividades. Este curso pretende ser un curso diferente. Aprenderemos jugando! A través de 9 ejercicios, 9 retos de una dificultad creciente, este curso nos proporcionará todas las habilidades necesarias para tener un conocimiento profundo de las herramientas más importantes de Adobe Photoshop. Se trata de un curso eminentemente práctico en donde se proponen 10 ejercicios para que el alumno los realice primero por si solo antes de ver el video y ponga a prueba sus conocimientos.

item.title: Ultimate Adobe Photoshop CC Masterclass Basics To Advanced
item.description: Learn Adobe Photoshop CC From Scratch & Ultimate Photoshop Masterclass Course For Newbie. If you are a beginner and looking to learn photoshop from scratch then this course will help you to learn Adobe Photoshop Professionally. For learning graphics design and photoshop retouching from beginner to advanced this course can be a lighthouse for you. You can learn from this course about Photoshop Layer, Color and Adjustment, Photoshop Color Correction, Shape and Symbol, Content-Aware & Cropping, Photoshop Text Style, Gradient Stroke & Bevel, Shadow, Blending, Selection, Photoshop Masking, Blur & Filters, Transform, Warp & Distort, Clipping Mask, Retouch, Photoshop Retouching, Effect Of Visual Style, Brush, Export, Earning Money With Graphics Design Work, Advance Tool and many more.

item.title: Graphic Design - Passive Income Downloads & Self Publishing
item.description: -- Updated 6/28/21, remixed audio on all lessons -- So what is the deal with selling downloads and print-on-demand (AKA Self Publishing)? The answers are in this class! It doesn't matter how far along you are in your creative arts business, how old you are, how extensive your portfolio is - setting up downloads NOW creates passive future income for years to come. PLUS I show you how you can use them NOW as your own marketing tools while having the same items pull double duty as passive income streams.

item.title: All In One Adobe Photoshop Essential Course For Everyone
item.description: In this course you will Learn 7 Types Important Work Of Adobe Photoshop With Step-By-Step Video Tutorial for your brand or business or for your personal use! · This course is actually for anyone because this course provides 7 Essential practical projects · Do you want to create your own social media graphics, business card, logo or something but you have no idea that how to use Photoshop or don't know where to begin?

item.title: Learn User Experience Design from A-Z: Adobe XD UI/UX Design
item.description: Welcome to the Learn User Experience Design from A-Z: Adobe XD UI UX Design Where you’re going to learn how to get started with User Experience and User Interface Design (UX/UI) Design and how to land your first job as a UX Designer even if you have no prior knowledge or experience. In this practical, hands-on course our main objective is to give you the education not just to understand the ins and outs of UX and UI Design, but also to learn exactly how the web development industry works, the different roles within a team, how color psychology and color schemes work , so you can learn first hand exactly how to design websites and mobile apps in Adobe XD and create an amazing user experience as a UX & UI Designer.

item.title: Procreate: Getting Started With Procreate on the iPad (2021)
item.description: Learn how to use Procreate 5X on the iPad with the Apple Pencil for digital art, illustration, drawing and painting. The iPad (Pro, Air 3, Mini 5, iPad 7) with Procreate 5X can be turned into a mini art studio, a powerful digital drawing tool that you can take with you anywhere. Procreate is one of the best digital art apps in the world of digital art. I believe in the Learning by Doing principle.

item.title: Graphic Design - Bulletproof Freelance Business
item.description: Creating the graphics is only one part of the job! There is so much more that goes on behind the scenes that can eat into your design time - and PROFITS - if you don’t have your business model set up to protect you and create a transparent and open designer/client relationship at the same time. Running a small business always has a fair share of the unexpected. Things happen outside the usual ‘get hired - do the design - get paid’ operations that can slow you down.

item.title: Learn Cinema 4D: Low Poly Planet
item.description: Do you want to learn 3D modelling quickly & easily by creating trendy low poly artwork? You can do it in this course and learn the basics of Cinema 4D by creating a Low Poly Planet! This class is perfect for web designers, graphic designers, illustrators and anyone else who would like to learn a bit of 3D modelling to add to their designs. Get started with 3D modelling & take this course now to learn Cinema 4D in just a few hours!

item.title: Complete Adobe Animate Megacourse: Beginner to Expert
item.description: Have you ever wanted to learn how to animate? From childhood and adult favourites like Disney, to advertisements and short films, animation is all around us. Whether you’re an artist out to create original and fan content like short films and sketches, or a designer looking to expand their professional portfolio, animation isn’t just for the professionally-trained artist. Even someone with no animation background can learn the skills and start creating beautiful pieces of art - and we’re here to teach you how.

item.title: Adobe Photoshop CC Crash Course Learn Photoshop In Two Hour
item.description: Hi There, I am Stephen Koel Soren and I am a Graphics and Web Expert. This is a crash course for Adobe Photoshop and You will learn only the essential part that is really required for design in Photoshop within hour. You will learn from this course: Color and Adjustment Content-Aware & Cropping Text Style Shadow Selection & Masking Blur & Filters Retouch and many more. This course is especially designed for beginner those who want to learn photoshop basic and essential part within a short time.

item.title: Complete Course of After Effects: Learn From an Expert
item.description: Hi. This is Mohammad Fazel, motion designer and i have 10 years of experience in this field. I'll be glad to share my exprience in After Effects with you. in this course, I'll explore all capabilities that After Effects has in making Motion graphics and visual Effects. after watching this course, you'll absolutely be ready to enter the world of motion graphics and visual effects. you don't need any prior knowledge for this course and I'll teach you from introducing you to after effects to the point that you learn everything about the software.
